c:functionType.name: SlidingWindowScore
c:functionType.c:documentation:
The function type for scoring individual data according to some criteria.
The value returned by the scoring function should be coherent with the scoring value expected by the select function. For the default select function, it should return a numeric or date value.
To remove a datum unconditionally, null should be returned.
The function is called with a null this context.
The default function returns the value of the given datum for the dimension of the sliding window.

c:functionType.name: SlidingWindowSelect
c:functionType.c:documentation:
The function to select which data to remove given an array of datums.
The function is called with a null this context.
The default function removes datums whose score places them outside the sliding window interval. Also, if a datum's score is not numeric or a Date object, the datum is not removed.

c:argument.name: allData
c:argument.c:documentation: An array of datums to evaluate.

c:argument.name: score
c:argument.c:documentation: The function to use for scoring datums.

c:argument.name: remove
c:argument.c:documentation: An array to store the datums to remove
